00030         #define CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE                 -1

00034 VMEWrapper::VMEWrapper( )
00035 {
00036         memset( &this->m_input_data, 0, sizeof( this->m_input_data));
00037         memset( &this->m_handle, 0, sizeof( this->m_handle));
00038         this->m_handle.m_vme_handle= CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE;
00039 }
00040 
00041 VMEWrapper::~VMEWrapper(void)
00042 {
00043     End();
00044 }
00045 bool VMEWrapper::Init( const InputData& input_data)
00046 {
00047         //
00048         // HACK: Overwrite this according to your VME library specific needs
00049         // 
00050 
00051         memcpy( &this->m_input_data, &input_data, sizeof( this->m_input_data));
00052 
00053         wxString vme_board_type_string( this->m_input_data.m_board_type);
00054 
00055         // Init CAEN VME handle
00056         if( !vme_board_type_string.CmpNoCase(_("V1718")))
00057         {
00058                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00059                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, &this->m_handle.m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00060                 {
00061                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::Init failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= %s"), vme_board_type_string.c_str(), this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( cv_error_code) ));
00062                         return false;
00063                 }
00064         }
00065         else if( !vme_board_type_string.CmpNoCase(_("V2718")))
00066         {
00067                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00068                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, &this->m_handle.m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00069                 {
00070                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::Init failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= %s"), vme_board_type_string.c_str(), this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( cv_error_code) ));
00071                         return false;
00072                 }
00073         }
00074         else
00075         {
00076                 // Automatically detect board type
00077                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00078                 // try V1718
00079                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, &this->m_handle.m_vme_handle))== cvSuccess)
00080                 {
00081                         return true;
00082                 }
00083                 // try V2718
00084                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, &this->m_handle.m_vme_handle))== cvSuccess)
00085                 {
00086                         return true;
00087                 }
00088                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::Init Cannot find any vme board (V1718 or V2718) on link '%d' and board number '%d'"), this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num));
00089                 return false;
00090         }
00091         return true;
00092 }
00093 bool VMEWrapper::End( void)
00094 {
00095         //
00096         // HACK: Overwrite this according to your VME library specific needs
00097         // 
00098 
00099         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00100     if(this->m_handle.m_vme_handle == CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE)
00101         return true;
00102 
00103         if( ( err_code= CAENVME_End( this->m_handle.m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00104         {
00105                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::End failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= '%s'"), this->m_input_data.m_board_type, this->m_input_data.m_vme_link, this->m_input_data.m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code)));
00106                 return false;
00107         }               
00108         this->m_handle.m_vme_handle= CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE;
00109         return true;
00110 }

00112 bool VMEWrapper::ClearBitmaskReg( UINT32 reg_offset, UINT32 reg_value)
00113 {
00114         UINT32 org_reg_value= 0;
00115         if( !this->ReadReg( reg_offset, org_reg_value))
00116                 return false;
00117         org_reg_value&= ~reg_value;
00118         if( !this->WriteReg( reg_offset, org_reg_value))
00119                 return false;
00120         return true;
00121 }
00122 bool VMEWrapper::SetBitmaskReg( UINT32 reg_offset, UINT32 reg_value)
00123 {
00124         UINT32 org_reg_value= 0;
00125         if( !this->ReadReg( reg_offset, org_reg_value))
00126                 return false;
00127         org_reg_value|= reg_value;
00128         if( !this->WriteReg( reg_offset, org_reg_value))
00129                 return false;
00130         return true;
00131 }
00132 bool VMEWrapper::WriteReg( UINT32 reg_offset, UINT32 reg_value)
00133 {
00134         //
00135         // HACK: Overwrite this according to your VME library specific needs
00136         // 
00137         if( this->m_handle.m_vme_handle== CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE)
00138         {
00139                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::WriteReg error '%s'"), "Invalid handle value"));
00140                 return false;
00141         }
00142         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00143         if( ( err_code= CAENVME_WriteCycle( this->m_handle.m_vme_handle, this->m_input_data.m_board_base_add+ reg_offset, (void*)&reg_value, cvA32_S_DATA, cvD32))!= cvSuccess)
00144         {
00145                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::WriteReg error '%s'"), CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code)));
00146                 return false;
00147         }
00148         return true;
00149 }
00150 
00151 bool VMEWrapper::ReadReg( UINT32 reg_offset, UINT32& reg_value)
00152 {
00153         //
00154         // HACK: Overwrite this according to your VME library specific needs
00155         // 
00156 
00157         if( this->m_handle.m_vme_handle== CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE)
00158         {
00159                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::ReadReg error '%s'"), "Invalid handle value"));
00160                 return false;
00161         }
00162         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00163         if( ( err_code= CAENVME_ReadCycle( this->m_handle.m_vme_handle, this->m_input_data.m_board_base_add+ reg_offset, (void*)&reg_value, cvA32_S_DATA, cvD32))!= cvSuccess)
00164         {
00165                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VMEWrapper::ReadReg error '%s'"), CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code)));
00166                 return false;
00167         }
00168         return true;
00169 }
